search.title: Property Search
search.subtitle: Your personal property hunter in Geneva.
search.description: We actively search for the best opportunities for you — on- and off-market — combining prospecting, rigorous pre-selection and administrative validation. You save time and access rarely published properties.

features.selection: Rigorous pre-selection based on your criteria
features.negotiation: Support for negotiation and file preparation

appartements.subtitle: Browse our catalog of available properties.
appartements.description: Updated listings: apartments for rent and sale in the Lake Geneva region. Contact us directly to arrange a visit or get more information.

travaux.title: Construction & Renovation
travaux.subtitle: Complete or partial renovation of your property.
travaux.description: We manage your project from A to Z: assessment of needs, selection of certified local craftspeople, planning and quality control. Whether it's a complete overhaul, structural renovation or interior design, we guarantee a careful result and respect for deadlines.

features.renovation: Major renovations and shared wall work

nettoyage.title: Professional Cleaning
nettoyage.subtitle: End of lease, end of project and regular maintenance cleaning.
nettoyage.description: Trained teams and professional equipment for impeccable cleaning: guaranteed end of lease, post-project cleaning with waste removal, periodic building maintenance and window cleaning. We use eco-friendly products on request.

features.finbail: End of lease cleaning with handover checklist
features.vitres: Window and façade cleaning and degreasing

demenagement.title: Moving & Logistics
demenagement.subtitle: Private and professional moves, all-inclusive.
demenagement.description: Complete and stress-free organization of your move: estimation, professional packing, secure transport and installation in your new location. We offer insurance options, temporary storage and bulk item handling.

features.miseenplace: Installation and space organization at destination

relocation.title: Relocation & Housing Search
relocation.subtitle: Connecting you to find your ideal home.
relocation.description: Complete support for people in transition: area selection, file preparation, meetings with landlords and administrative follow-up. We facilitate quick and smooth settlement in French-speaking Switzerland.

features.recherche: Targeted search for rental/purchase matching your profile
features.preselection: Pre-selected viewings according to your priorities
features.dossier: Preparation and validation of rental files
features.miseenrelation: Connection with landlords and property managers

relocation.disclaimer: Referral and administrative assistance services only. Léman Prestige Sàrl does not act as a property manager and does not sign lease/sub-lease contracts on behalf of the parties.

souslocation.title: Sub-letting
souslocation.subtitle: Sub-letting management on behalf of third parties.
souslocation.description: Complete sub-letting management: search for reliable tenants, file verification, obtaining authorization from landlords and key handover organization. We handle communication and follow-up to minimize your paperwork.

features.contrat: Assistance in drafting the sub-lease agreement

souslocation.disclaimer: Referral and administrative assistance services only. Léman Prestige Sàrl does not act as a property manager and does not sign lease/sub-lease contracts on behalf of the parties.

administratif.title: Administrative Support
administratif.subtitle: Assistance with your administrative procedures in Switzerland.
administratif.description: Personalized support for all administrative procedures related to moving and housing: file preparation, official letters, service registrations and procedure follow-up. We simplify procedures for individuals and businesses.

features.documents: Organization and verification of supporting documents
